messages.message: hi, does anyone recall why we had chosen to NOT install spacy large model (https://spacy.io/models/en#en_core_web_lg) in celery-app-tasks? @Matt Macnak needs the model for a customer demo on the 4th. I am planning to install it tomorrow and deploy to production. In case, we don't want to keep for long-term, I'll remove it after the demo.

Hi @Ashish ideally all the models should now be served from model service.  Additionally, we want to keep the memory footprint of app-tasks smaller because we now run 6/8 workers instead of 4.  Can we please not push to production, and instead deploy to sandboxes?

Shaunak, is there an existing sandbox that Matt can use?

Matt, are you okay to do a demo on a site that's not instabase.com (http://instabase.com)?

@Ashish we can create sandboxes with self serve.  We are really trying extremely hard to make minimal changes to production.  @Matt Macnak can you please create a sandbox?  

And, please reach out to <#C01N7DV1137|> for any such requests.  That way we can keep track of any changes.
Matt- let me know if you continue to blocked on spacy matters
